structure:Codelist.common:Name: Greek Urbanization Classification
structure:Codelist.common:Description: Classification of urbanization levels including major metropolitan areas, urban centers, semi-urban areas, and rural areas for labor force statistics.

structure:Code.common:Name: Not applicable
structure:Code.common:Description: Not applicable to the data or special processing code.

structure:Code.common:Name: Athens agglomeration
structure:Code.common:Description: Greater Athens metropolitan area including the capital city and surrounding municipalities.

structure:Code.common:Name: Thessaloniki agglomeration
structure:Code.common:Description: Greater Thessaloniki metropolitan area including the second largest city and surrounding municipalities.

structure:Code.common:Name: Other urban areas
structure:Code.common:Description: Other urban centers and cities outside of the major metropolitan areas.

structure:Code.common:Name: Semi-urban areas
structure:Code.common:Description: Areas with characteristics between urban and rural, including small towns and suburban areas.

structure:Code.common:Name: Rural areas
structure:Code.common:Description: Predominantly agricultural and sparsely populated areas with limited urban development.
